version_description:
-Huge performance improvements. (Subdividing/changing level/loading/sculpting is 3x to 6x faster, depending on devices)
-Added Crease brush.
-Exposed falloff & general pressure curves.
-Improved symmetry handling.
-Small fixes and improvements.

-Added new “Auto Retopo” feature that attempts to automagically create topologically clean, quad dominant meshes out of any mesh.
-Improved quick volume-based remeshing results, generated meshes are much cleaner now.
-Improved “Make Symmetrical…”, now avoids thin faces around the symmetry axis.
-Added a way to extract thick submeshes from masks. (useful for clothes, props/parts)
-Added quick Soften/Sharpen mask shortcuts, previously only available through menu.
-Added “smooth stroke“ mode for sculpting brushes, where sensible.
-Added new navigation mode that allows using touch input for navigation and Apple Pencil for sculpting/painting.
-Added a way to store sculpt brush presets in different user-created preset collections. (iPad only)
-Added file menu extra data and different sorting methods. (alphabetical/date/size)
-Fixes ImagePlane disappearing when sculpting objects way off the origin.
-Fixes locked navigation buttons being silently unlocked after gestures: pinch (zoom) or two finger drag (pan) action, now they will visibly unlock.
-Minor UI improvements.

-Unlocked paint layer blending modes.
-Added paint layer mask and mask stack support.
-Added paint adjustment layers. (Levels, ColorBalance, HSL, HSV, Invert, Luminosity)
-Added paint layer group support.
-Added paint layer color tagging support.
-Added partial layer stack display control.
-Added a way to create automatic, simple uv mapping for meshes.
-Auto-retopo now creates simple UVs too.
-Improved sharing functionality, from “Share…” menu and “Render” submenu.
-Now asking for confirmation before every delete action to prevent user accidents.
-Now “Reapply Symmetry” can be used with masks to partially/selectively reapply symmetry to meshes.
-Fixes possible corner case that could result in hollow meshes generated during remeshing.
-Fixes mid-stroke tool hot-swapping bug that could result in a sculpted line or no history being added for the stroke.
-Fixes brush applied at max strength if buildup is non-default and alternate mode is toggled mid-stroke. (only Standard/Clay/Layer brushes support buildup).
-Fixes potentially odd behavior when using Move brush around symmetry axis when brush is very large and overlapped on the mirrored side.
-Fixes stamps not sculpting correctly if a mesh had non-baked transforms.
-Minor UI improvements.

Big changes:
-Reduced memory usage significantly. (should allow pushing around 2x more polygons ;))
-Sped up sculpting dense meshes.
-Added Pose tool which replaces legacy Translate, Rotate and Scale tools.

Smaller changes: (worth listing)
-Exposed scene camera parameters.
-Improved and unified color picker.
-Standard material type now can show sculpt masks. (although Blinn/LitSphere types are still the recommended ones for sculpting)
-Added file loading from non-app-local directory locations.
-Added drag & drop support for iPhone.
-Exposed extra internal parameters for Clay brush.
-Increased maximum sculpting brush size.
-Now “Apple Pencil (only)” mode disables completely all gestures. (pinch/drag/rotate)
-Fix for possible environment light flickering.
-Fixed wrong channel order (BGRA) in turntables, increased turntable bitrate, added “framing” and “tilt” parameter options.

Fixes:
-Fixes clipped color picker when used from texture parameters (Standard material)
-Attempting to use Save for the first time without a name will now ask for a name.

-Added back “old school” translate, rotate and scale manipulators, with new symmetry and pivot-offsetting support, renamed "Pose" to "Transform" to reduce user confusion.
-Added “Split Masked” which splits the mesh into masked/unmasked faces.
-Replaced partial selection-based actions with masking-based actions in an effort to reduce unnecessary complexity, removed “Select” brush as it’s not needed anymore. (Topological symmetry and partial visibility can now be set via masks)
-Moved partial visibility menu actions to their own submenu.
-Revamped help section.
-Improved color picking experience on iPad.
-Added back triple-tapping of shortcut buttons to lock (avoiding their previous 0.33 second delay in response time)
-Swapped Light with Mask shortcut button placement in landscape mode for 9.7” iPad.
-Fixes material assignments not copied after mesh duplication/merging/splitting/extraction.
-Fixes masking shortcut brush size not matching active brush size.
-Various other small core and interface fixes & improvements.

-Added back “old school” translate, rotate and scale manipulators, with new symmetry and pivot-offsetting support, renamed "Pose" to "Transform" to reduce user confusion.
-Added “Split Masked” which splits the mesh into masked/unmasked faces.
-Replaced partial selection-based actions with masking-based actions in an effort to reduce unnecessary complexity, removed “Select” brush as it’s not needed anymore. (Topological symmetry and partial visibility can now be set via masks)
-Moved partial visibility menu actions to their own submenu.
-Revamped help section.
-Improved color picking experience on iPad.
-Added back triple-tapping of shortcut buttons to lock (avoiding their previous 0.33 second delay in response time)
-Swapped Light with Mask shortcut button placement in landscape mode for 9.7” iPad.
-Fixes material assignments not copied after mesh duplication/merging/splitting/extraction.
-Fixes masking shortcut brush size not matching active brush size.
-Various other small core and interface fixes & improvements.
-Updates small backend bits and pieces.
-Fixes possible inconsistent validation issue with In App Purchases.
-Fixes crashes when validating partially stored In App Purchases.

-Fixes an issue that could crash while subdividing an invalid mesh, now an error message will be shown instead.
-Adds iPod Touch support.

-Now allowing simultaneous pinch/drag gestures for touch based navigation instead of only image projection.
-Added Apple Pencil custom double tap support.
-Added "quick selection" shortcut. (navigation shortcut + tap mesh changes selection)
-Improved non-manifold mesh checks now catching more possible errors.
-Added wireframe display support for texture painting mode.
-Added “Invert Transform” action to Transform tool. (resets the model and its pivot to the origin)
-Now materials can be assigned via drag & drop.
-Avoids Alembic file related crashes when trying to import broken files, now errors will be shown instead.
-Fixed a possible issue where if an external file being referenced was deleted by the user before saving the scene, it wouldn’t be stored along with it, now a temp copy of referenced files is stored internally to avoid this. (seen in painting context)
-Other small fixes and improvements.

-Added new symmetry button and menu to sidebar.
-Disallowed changing masking/smooth modifier state mid-stroke.
-Disallowed using mesh-altering keyboard shortcuts mid-stroke.
-Changed object-space (local) symmetry to world-space (global) symmetry. (local symmetry will be reintroduced soon)
-Improved cap holes.
-Redirected feedback to forum, added forum to "Learn" section.
-Fixed rare, random inaccurate vertex selection. (more visible with Move brush around symmetry plane on low polycount meshes)
-Fixed undo on unselected meshes undoing actions but not refreshing the mesh display.
-Fixed changing tools mid-stroke does not add history for the first.
-Fixed masking not consistently displayed after changing sublevels.
-Various other small fixes and improvements.

-Allows opening symmetry menu when symmetry is disabled. (for Mirroring purposes)
-Fixes possible issue with partially visible meshes.

-Sped up mesh creation, subdivision and level change, whilst keeping memory usage intact.
(Subdividing is now 4.4x faster)
-Ignores Pencil orbiting when “Touch Navigation & Apple Pencil” is enabled.
-Added undo/redo gesture.
-Avoids possible OOM crash duplicating nodes.
-Fixed camera rotation snapping.
-Fixed portrait orientation reference images displaying wrong.
-Painting help section is now automatically shown on texturing IAP purchase/restore.
-Small UI polish here and there.
-Added a way to bypass memory usage estimation when loading heavy scenes.

-Added mesh projection feature.
-Added alternate shortcut press whilst pressing "Subdivide" to tessellate the mesh (no smooth subdivision).
-Fixed multi-mesh OBJ PolyPaint exports.
-Fixes texture painting whilst orbiting with touch when navigation mode “Touch Navigation & Pencil” is enabled.
-Covered missing corner case when attempting to rebuild sub-levels from non-subdivided meshes.
-Allowed direct importing of MRM files which allows opening recovery files.

-Updated frame selection to factor in partial visibility.
-Fixes very rare crash on redo after recreating dense meshes.
-Corrected display of stamps in UI after quick-swapping tools (Smooth/Masking shortcuts).

-Fixes exporting many meshes at the same time could cause the visual display of cells to seem "unchecked" on scrolling back up even if they were internally checked.
-Changes handling of consecutive "Remesh" actions in history.
-Improved sidebar shortcuts on iPad (now detachable and configurable)

-Fixes possible crash exporting STL files (introduced in 1.7.0).
-Fixes drag to dismiss color picker on iPhone kicking in when not supposed to (introduced in 1.7.0).
-Ensures texturing context slider isn't partially covered on iPhone.

-Added extra gestures requested.
-Added shortcut toggles choice.

-Polished remaining user interface bits.
-Added "Duplicate" and "Delete Hidden" shortcuts to extra shortcuts.
